title: my Pixel 4a does not display my phone number
content:
my NEW Pixel 4a's telephone number does not display in:
Settings / Phone number
also in Settings / Sim status / Phone number on SIM
on both counts, the answer is 'Unknown'
I have already seen a post on this here forum, stating that, since this is SIM business, I should talk to my my network supplier. I have spoken to them once already, and they have sent me an SMS message without problem, so the number (transferred from my previous phone) is working.
So, I guess I could get back to my network supplier and ask to speak to more technical folks?
Anyone can shed more light on this?
Many thanks!
